name: Orbeat
description:
Orbeat is a single-tap reaction game that will keep you hooked for hours!

Tap to make your revolving dot dash forward based on its angle in the orbit, and hit the revolving targets. BEAT THAT!

The music beat is so fast and synched with orbit beat that makes the user experience powerful and quick.

Keep going inside orbits!

The game features 20 amazing themes that switch as the game progresses.

Orbit + Beat = Orbeat
